name: Advance D&R Department
desc: It remains misery why FSF is experiencing this massive arsenal expanding in the recent years, but the battle-experienced, loyalty and background-clean officers are getting this department. Isolated from outside eyes, this move has been seen as a prediction of the company that tremendous chaos is coming
